title: Emerald Blossom Vanki - The Timeless Armlet of Elegance
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Heera). Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Vanki showcases a contemporary floral design with traditional South Indian influences. A vibrant, square-cut emerald is the centerpiece, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The openwork design features intricate, filigree-inspired detailing enhanced by delicate diamond accents. The intricate detailing is reminiscent of traditional 'kundan' jewelry without the use of enamel, creating a lighter and more modern feel.
colors: Predominantly gold (yellow) with the vibrant green of the Emerald and the brilliant white of the Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and festive celebrations (Panduga). Its modern design also makes it suitable for formal gatherings and upscale events.
description: This Vanki is a fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The high-quality emerald and diamonds, combined with the meticulous craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish, make it a valuable heirloom piece. The openwork design ensures comfortable wear while showcasing the exquisite details of the jewelry. It's a statement piece that speaks volumes about your discerning taste and appreciation for timeless elegance.
